details: Medium resistance/gearing at 100 rpm for the work period and low resistance at 60 rpm for the rest period.
Really high resistance/gearing at 60rpm for the work period and low-medium resistance at 60-80 rpm for the rest period.
Medium resistance/gearing at 120-200 rpm (as fast as your legs can possibly go) for the work period and low resistance at 60-80 rpm for the rest period.
